# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/dojo`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Dojo (http://dojotoolkit.org).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/dojo
